pl.socketbyte.opensectors.linker.api

Class SectorAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.socketbyte.opensectors.linker.api.SectorAPI

  • public class SectorAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    This API is targeted towards beginner users unfamiliar with any technology presented here. It limits Kryo or Kryonet usage as much as possible to make simple, fun coding experience for new programmers.
